page.title: 18SCHOOL EXCHANGE part 1
page.content: We took part in a school exchange with pupils from a number of schools in Denmark. Forty five pupils took part in the exchange from four different schools, two in Derry and two in Limavady. From this arrangement a mixture of people from different religions and backgrounds were assembled. We travelled by bus to Larne crossed to Scotland and then by train to Harwich and finally by ship and boat to our final destination. We were to attend four schools in the north of Denmark on Jylland. I was hosted by the Winkle family and their daughter Anita to whom I had been writing for three months.
